alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:19PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alamosa, northeastern Rio Grande and south central Saguache Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Center, or 25 miles northwest of Alamosa, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Center and Hooper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft
